text:
### Login
```
POST /api/login
```

Request
```javascript
{
    username: "yogsther",
    password: "testpass123"
}
```

Response success:

```javascript
{
    success: true,
    me: {
    "id": 3,
    "username": "Yogsther",
    "name": "Olle Kaiser",
    "created": 1569100466208,
    "admin": 1,
    "email": null,
    "avatar": null,
    "slack_id": null,
    "slack_domain": null,
    "checked_in": false,
    "projects": []
    }
}
```
Response failure:
```javascript
{
    "success": false,
    "text": "Wrong username or password"
}
```
title: POST login
